Geography.name: Silk Road Secrets
Geography.description: Journey through history and geography as you uncover the mysteries of ancient trade routes. This quiz explores the lands and cultures connected by the Silk Road, testing your knowledge of historical locations and cultural landmarks.

questions.text: What part of the world was once known as Cathay?
questions.hint: This region was historically visited by explorers like Marco Polo.

questions.text: People are supposed to drive on the left-hand side of the road in which country?

questions.text: Where is the Louvre museum?
questions.hint: This museum is in a European capital along the Seine River.

questions.text: Which of these countries is not in Europe?
questions.hint: This country is in the Middle East, unlike the others, which are European.

questions.text: According to legend, in what country are you most likely to meet a leprechaun?
questions.hint: This country is famous for its green landscapes and Celtic folklore.

questions.text: In what U.S. city can you find the Basketball Hall of Fame?
questions.hint: This city in Massachusetts is where basketball was invented.

questions.text: What is the capital of New Zealand?
questions.hint: This city is located on the North Island and known for its windy weather.

questions.text: What city's airport uses the code ORD?
questions.hint: This major U.S. city’s airport code is derived from its former name, Orchard Field.

questions.text: In what country did Pokemon originate?
questions.hint: This Asian nation is known for its influential pop culture, including anime and video games.

questions.text: Into what body of water does the Rhone River flow?
questions.hint: This body of water borders southern France and is known for its warm climate.

questions.text: In what city would you find people studying art and design at the Fashion Institute of Technology?
questions.hint: This city is a global fashion capital, home to many design schools.

questions.text: Where is Ghirardelli Square located?

questions.text: As of 1999, which state has the most Girl Scouts?

questions.text: Which of these countries does not participate in NAFTA?

questions.text: What is the capital of North Dakota?
